name: Ice Cream Quest - Beach Battle
description:
Made in less than 20 hours, with my daughter again on art duties our second collaboration.

As of right now anyone playing on keyboard and not controller will have to assigns inputs as I'm too tired to keep going lol.  Game Jams are great fun but quite exhausting.

Please Note: Forgot to put info in the game on how to use the Sonic Dash, on the controller its R1 assign whatever you like to it on kb.

Y Button for Pause.
